00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 import rospy
00004 import numpy as NP
00005 import tf.transformations
00006 import rosbag
00007 from math import cos, sin, tan
00008 from last_letter.msg import inputs as inputType
00009 from nav_msgs.msg import Odometry
00010 from geometry_msgs.msg import WrenchStamped
00011 from geometry_msgs.msg import Vector3, Point
00012 from geometry_msgs.msg import Quaternion
00013 from geometry_msgs.msg import TransformStamped
00014 from last_letter.srv import *

00016 
00017 class model:
00018         def __init__(self):
00019                 self.kinematics = Odometry()
00020                 self.kinematics.header.frame_id = 'bodyFrame' #body axes position frame name
00021                 self.tprev = rospy.Time.now()
00022                 self.kinematics.header.stamp = self.tprev
00023                 self.kinematics.pose.pose.position = Point(0.0, 0.0, -300.0) #initial position
00024                 self.kinematics.pose.pose.orientation = Quaternion(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0) #initial orientation 
00025                 self.kinematics.twist.twist.linear = Vector3(20.0, 0.0, 0.0) #initial velocity
00026                 self.kinematics.twist.twist.angular = Vector3(0.0, 0.0, 0.0) #initial angular rotation
00027                 self.input = [0, 0, 0, 0]
00028 
00029                 self.dynamics = WrenchStamped()
00030                 self.dynamics.header.frame_id = 'bodyFrame' #body axes force frame name
00031                 
00032                 self.state_pub = rospy.Publisher('sim/states', Odometry)
00033                 self.wrench_pub = rospy.Publisher('sim/wrenchStamped', WrenchStamped)
00034                 rospy.Subscriber("sim/input", inputType, self.getInput,1)
00035 
00036 
00037         #simulation step, calls the differential equation solver, is called at simulation rate, supports variable simulation step time
00038         def step(self):
00039                 #rospy.loginfo('entered step')#
00040                 self.dt = rospy.Time.now() - self.tprev
00041                 self.dt = self.dt.to_sec()
00042                 self.tprev = rospy.Time.now()           
00043                 self.kinematics.header.stamp = self.tprev
00044                 
00045                 #Calculate body forces/torques
00046                 self.dynamics.header.stamp = self.tprev
00047                 #rospy.loginfo('calling getForce')#
00048                 self.dynamics.wrench.force = getForce(self.kinematics, self.input)
00049                 #rospy.loginfo('calling getTorque')#
00050                 self.dynamics.wrench.torque = getTorque(self.kinematics, self.input)
00051                 
00052                 #Apply force/torques on the model
00053                 #rospy.loginfo('calling diffEq')#
00054                 self.diffEq()
00055         
00056         #Record messages to a bag
00057         def record(self):
00058                 bag.write('record.bag',self.kinematics)
00059                 bag.write('recrod.bag',self.dynamics)
00060 
00061         #access and store control inputs in the model object
00062         def getInput(self,inputs):
00063                 self.input = inputs
00064 
00065         #Differential equation step solver
00066         def diffEq(self):
00067                 q1=self.kinematics.pose.pose.orientation.x
00068                 q2=self.kinematics.pose.pose.orientation.y
00069                 q3=self.kinematics.pose.pose.orientation.z
00070                 q4=self.kinematics.pose.pose.orientation.w
00071 
00072                 #Create angles, linear speeds, angular speeds
00073                 (phi, theta, psi) = tf.transformations.euler_from_quaternion([q1, q2, q3, q4])
00074                 (u, v, w) = (self.kinematics.twist.twist.linear.x, self.kinematics.twist.twist.linear.y, self.kinematics.twist.twist.linear.z)
00075                 (p, q, r) = (self.kinematics.twist.twist.angular.x, self.kinematics.twist.twist.angular.y, self.kinematics.twist.twist.angular.z)
00076                 
00077                 #Create position derivatives
00078                 R = tf.transformations.euler_matrix(phi, theta, psi, 'rzyx')
00079                 (pndot, pedot, pddot, discard) = R*NP.matrix([[u], [v], [w], [0]])
00080 
00081                 #Create speed derivatives
00082                 m = rospy.get_param('airframe/m')
00083                 (fx, fy, fz) = (self.dynamics.wrench.force.x, self.dynamics.wrench.force.y, self.dynamics.wrench.force.z)
00084 
00085                 mat2 = 1.0/m*NP.matrix([[fx], [fy], [fz]]) #Linear Acceleration
00086                 mat1 = NP.matrix([[r*v-q*w],[p*w-r*u],[q*u-p*v]]) #Corriolis Acceleration
00087                 
00088                 (udot, vdot, wdot) = mat1 + mat2
00089                 udot = udot.item(0)
00090                 vdot = vdot.item(0)
00091                 wdot = wdot.item(0)
00092 
00093                 #Create angular derivatives
00094                 (phidot, thetadot, psidot) = NP.matrix([[1, sin(phi)*tan(theta), cos(phi)*tan(theta)],
00095                 [0, cos(phi), -sin(phi)],
00096                 [0, sin(phi)/cos(theta), cos(phi)/cos(theta)]])*NP.matrix([[p], [q], [r]])
00097 
00098                 #Create angular rate derivatives
00099                 j_x = rospy.get_param('airframe/j_x')
00100                 j_y = rospy.get_param('airframe/j_y')
00101                 j_z = rospy.get_param('airframe/j_z')
00102                 j_xz = rospy.get_param('airframe/j_xz')
00103                 G = j_x*j_z-pow(j_xz,2)
00104                 G1 = j_xz*(j_x-j_y+j_z)/G
00105                 G2 = (j_z*(j_z-j_y)+pow(j_xz,2))/G
00106                 G3 = j_z/G
00107                 G4 = j_xz/G
00108                 G5 = (j_z-j_x)/j_y
00109                 G6 = j_xz/j_y
00110 
00111                 G7 = ((j_x-j_y)*j_x+pow(j_xz,2))/G
00112                 G8 = j_x/G
00113                 (l, m, n) = (self.dynamics.wrench.torque.x, self.dynamics.wrench.torque.y, self.dynamics.wrench.torque.z)
00114                 (pdot, qdot, rdot) = NP.matrix([[G1*p*q-G2*q*r],[G5*p*r-G6*(pow(p,2)-pow(r,2))],[G7*p*q-G1*q*r]]) + NP.matrix([[G3*l+G4*n],[1/j_y*m],[G4*l+G8*n]])
00115                 pdot = pdot.item(0)
00116                 qdot = qdot.item(0)
00117                 rdot = rdot.item(0)
00118 
00119                 #Integrate quantities using forward Euler
00120                 self.kinematics.pose.pose.position.x = self.kinematics.pose.pose.position.x + pndot*self.dt
00121                 self.kinematics.pose.pose.position.y = self.kinematics.pose.pose.position.y + pedot*self.dt
00122                 self.kinematics.pose.pose.position.z = self.kinematics.pose.pose.position.z + pddot*self.dt
00123 
00124                 self.kinematics.twist.twist.linear.x = self.kinematics.twist.twist.linear.x + udot*self.dt
00125                 self.kinematics.twist.twist.linear.y = self.kinematics.twist.twist.linear.y + vdot*self.dt
00126                 self.kinematics.twist.twist.linear.z = self.kinematics.twist.twist.linear.z + wdot*self.dt
00127                 
00128                 phi = phi + phidot*self.dt
00129                 theta = theta + thetadot*self.dt
00130                 psi = psi + psidot*self.dt
00131                 (q1, q2, q3, q4) = tf.transformations.quaternion_from_euler(psi, theta, phi, 'rzyx')
00132                 self.kinematics.pose.pose.orientation.x = q1
00133                 self.kinematics.pose.pose.orientation.y = q2
00134                 self.kinematics.pose.pose.orientation.z = q3
00135                 self.kinematics.pose.pose.orientation.w = q4
00136                 
00137                 self.kinematics.twist.twist.angular.x  = self.kinematics.twist.twist.angular.x + pdot*self.dt
00138                 self.kinematics.twist.twist.angular.y  = self.kinematics.twist.twist.angular.y + qdot*self.dt
00139                 self.kinematics.twist.twist.angular.z  = self.kinematics.twist.twist.angular.z + rdot*self.dt
00140 
00141                 #Publish states and wrench
00142                 self.state_pub.publish(self.kinematics)
00143                 self.wrench_pub.publish(self.dynamics)
00144 
00145 def getForce(states, inputs):
00146         #rospy.loginfo('Entered getForce')#
00147         rospy.wait_for_service('calc_force')
00148         try:
00149                 #rospy.loginfo('Creating serivce proxy')#
00150                 calcForce = rospy.ServiceProxy('calc_force', calc_force)
00151                 #rospy.loginfo('Calling the proxy')#
00152                 resp1 = calcForce(states,inputs)
00153                 return Vector3(resp1.force.x, resp1.force.y, resp1.force.z)
00154         except rospy.ServiceException, e:
00155                 print "Service call failed: %s"%e
00156 
00157 def getTorque(states, inputs):
00158         rospy.wait_for_service('calc_torque')
00159         try:
00160                 calcTorque = rospy.ServiceProxy('calc_torque', calc_torque)
00161                 resp1 = calcTorque(states, inputs)
00162                 return Vector3(resp1.torque.x, resp1.torque.y, resp1.torque.z)
00163         except rospy.ServiceException, e:
00164                 print "Service call failed: %s"%e
00165 
00166 
00167 
00168 if __name__ == '__main__':
00169         simRate = rospy.get_param('simRate')
00170         #bag = rosbag.Bag('record.bag','w')
00171         try:
00172                 rospy.init_node('simNode')
00173                 rospy.loginfo('SimNode up')
00174                 spinner = rospy.Rate(simRate)
00175                 rospy.loginfo('Spinner initialized')
00176                 modelObj = model()
00177                 rospy.loginfo('Initialized model')
00178                 rospy.sleep(0.2); #wait for nodes to get initialized
00179                 while not rospy.is_shutdown():
00180                         modelObj.step()
00181                         spinner.sleep()
00182                         #modelObj.record() #Enable selective topic recording                    
00183         except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
00184                 #bag.close() #Enable with .record() use
00185                 pass
